Base:Descriptions.Base:Description: pure white cloth pamphlet of S'Allumerian hymnals
A pure white cloth pamphlet of S'Allumerian hymnals.
A pure white cloth pamphlet of S'Allumerian hymnals.
The title of the pure white cloth pamphlet, "S'Allumerian Hymnals, Vol. 1" is writ in dark blue calligraphy.
pure white cloth pamphlet cover
A pure white cloth pamphlet cover inscribed with the title.
The title of the pure white cloth pamphlet, "Hymnals of S'Allumer, Vol. 1" writ in dark blue calligraphy.
Hymn 1
Hymn 2

"Hymn 2
O thou in all thy might so far, in all thy love so near,
Beyond the range of sun and star, and yet beside us here;
What heart can comprehend thy name, or searching find thee out,
Who art within, a quick'ning flame, a presence roundabout?
Yet though I know thee but in part, I ask not, S'allumer for more;
Enough for me to know thou art, to love thee, and adore.
And dearer than all things I know is child-like faith to me,
That makes the darkest way I go an open path to thee."

"Hymn 2
O thou in all thy might so far, in all thy love so near,
Beyond the range of sun and star, and yet beside us here;
What heart can comprehend thy name, or searching find thee out,
Who art within, a quick'ning flame, a presence roundabout?
Yet though I know thee but in part, I ask not, S'allumer for more;
Enough for me to know thou art, to love thee, and adore.
And dearer than all things I know is child-like faith to me,
That makes the darkest way I go an open path to thee."

the spine of the pamphlet
The spine of the pamphlet is made from simple parchment tied together with colorful yarn.

Core:Properties.Core:Property: X[M] \$delay(2, TRUE, "030f"); EmitTo( \$actor, "The pamphlet does not react to you in any way except to look more daunting and self-assured in its knowledge.");
